name: places/ChIJ4_1uJK1ZwokRhYn7RitVsQE
formattedAddress: 156 Sullivan St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 156 Sullivan St, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text:
I found Tomoko through a google search looking for Japanese Nail art manicure.
Tomoko is brilliant, super talented and has an attention to detail that i have never seen.  I highly recommend Tomoko. I will not trust my nails to anyone now. She had asked in advance if i had a photo to send to her of what i was thinking. She was so well prepared when i arrived. I highly recommend her!!

originalText.text:
So I’ve been coming here for almost a year and Tomoko never disappoints!! As a person who had a hard time growing her nails because I used to bite them a lot or they would easily break, having them done here has honestly helped so much. She will always take her time with you, review what design you want to do or suggest something if she thinks it’ll be better. As an introvert I’m really happy to have found an amazing and skillful person as Tomoko.
I even took my mom here and she loved how pampered and natural her nails were done. Can’t imagine trying to go somewhere else for the price and quality that Tomoko does. She really deserves all the five stars on this review!!

originalText.text:
Tomoko is wonderful, professional, and spectacular! She did an awesome job on my nails. Not only was she gentle, but she was sweet and took the time to make sure I got exactly what I wanted from the color to the length of my nail extensions. I trust her with my nails and really look forward to going back. Maybe next time I’ll get a design because from what I’ve seen on her Instagram? She’s a super talented nail artist!

I HIGHLY recommend Tomoko!

originalText.text: Tomoko is literally the best! She created such beautiful designs and did exactly what I asked for with her own creative liberty. I’ve had the nails on for a month now and they haven’t chipped at all nor separated from my nail. Great quality and will be going back!! (Pictures are from when my manicure was about a week old).

text.text: Tomoko is literally the best! She created such beautiful designs and did exactly what I asked for with her own creative liberty. I’ve had the nails on for a month now and they haven’t chipped at all nor separated from my nail. Great quality and will be going back!! (Pictures are from when my manicure was about a week old).

originalText.text: Tomoko is a real artist and professional. I was amazed at how well she created art on such a tiny palette. Her creations are intricate and beautiful such that I have so much joy every time I look at my nails! I am also very particular about my cuticle care as I spray my hands with alcohol all day for my job and she uses amazing attention to detail in all steps of nail and hand care. Very happy with my experience and the end result!
